FileFormat.FormatDescription: Gunpaint are raster image files associated with the Gunpaint graphics program for the Commodore 64. Files are exactly 33603 bytes long and have a 296x200 resolution.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The National Archives and Records Administration / The National Archives and Records Administration
FileFormat.ProvenanceDescription: 08/2023 (v.113)- Adjusted signature to include 'GUNPAINT' at an offset of 1002 from BOF. Submitted by National Archives and Records Administration.

InternalSignature.SignatureNote: BOF: 0x00 (Null) followed by '@' followed by a gap of 1000 bytes followed by 'GUNPAINT'
